Name: Scale Wizard
Descriptions: Are you inspired by the creativity of architects who wield magic in their plans? Explore your skills on creating a perfect plan and win the jackpot hence.
Rules: Online registration will be available for a specific  period. If seats are available spot registration will be  provided
Each  team should consist of a maximum of 3 member
Inter- college teaming up is also allowed. In such cases, points will be distributed equally among the colleges
Any number  of teams are allowed from one college
Use of internet and any other reference books are not permitted
Any kind of malpractice would result in disqualification
Event coordinators have the right to solve any disputes and their decision will be final
Finalized rules will be disclosed 5 mins before the event
Calculators, Mobile phones , Measuring instruments etc.  are NOT PERMITTED  and the required materials will provided at the venue
Only those teams which are able to complete the given task within the specified time can pass on to the following rounds
All students with a valid identity card from their respective educational institution and a valid DYUKSHA ID are eligible to participate in the event
Decision of organizers will be ﬁnal and binding on all
The organizers have full rights to call off the event if the required number of entries are not met, if that is the case the registered participants will be informed at the earliest
Change in rules, if any will be highlighted on the website and notiﬁed to the registered teams
